text: is a Japanese athlete. He is best known as a swimmer who competed at the Summer Olympic Games.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), Kosuke Hagino ; retrieved 2012-7-28. ==Career== He won a bronze medal in the Men's 400m individual medley at the 2012 Summer Olympics. His time of 4:10.01 was an Asian record. "2012 London Olympics: Kosuke Hagino With Asian Record to Lead 400 IM; Phelps Underperforms," Swimming World (US). July 28, 2012; retrieved 2012-7-28. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic gold medalists for Japan Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Japanese swimmers Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Tochigi Prefecture
title: Kosuke Hagino
